EmailTemplate.name: 13/06/2014 Summer Holiday Camps 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Summer Holiday Camps 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Summer Holiday Camps registration is now open. Find out about the different camps offered and register through the online form on the links provided below. Please register by 30th June.
Summer Holiday Camps Information (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xVEZnMTRaNjZoQ1U/edit?usp=sharing)
Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/17NMbjORC7zm_3d_EbKJyTOJgSHXpuLD655lcO8_uBjA/viewform)
Kind regards, Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
